column4: Is there a way I can set my screen resolution higher than 1024x768? The Screen Resolution dialog box only gives me three options, 640x480, 800x600, and 1024x768. I'd like to be able to set it to 1152x864 or higher.
you'll have to edit  the xorg.conf  file and add that resolution along with the proper refresh rate , which is 64 I think
i love you. :D restarting xserver now
